name: Aravind Datla
title: AI Engineer
professional_summary: Engineered AI-powered proof of concepts using Python and Java to address complex healthcare challenges, implementing LLMs for patient data analysis while ensuring HIPAA compliance and maintaining data privacy across all development stages.

Developed prompt engineering techniques for healthcare AI applications, creating custom function calling mechanisms that improved diagnostic accuracy and reduced processing time for medical records analysis by approximately 40%.

Integrated structured and unstructured healthcare data using FastAPI and Flask, building robust APIs that facilitated seamless communication between legacy hospital systems and modern AI-powered applications.

Applied advanced Java proficiency to create secure healthcare management systems, implementing encryption protocols that protected sensitive patient information while enabling authorized access for medical professionals.

Utilized OpenAI's GPT models to develop conversational AI assistants for patient engagement, designing natural language processing capabilities that understood medical terminology and provided accurate health information.

Collaborated with cross-functional healthcare teams to implement AI solutions for medical imaging analysis, using Python-based machine learning frameworks to identify patterns in radiology reports and assist in early disease detection.

Designed and deployed healthcare data pipelines using Apache Airflow, automating ETL processes that handled large volumes of patient data while maintaining compliance with FDA regulations and healthcare standards.

Created custom Git workflows for healthcare AI development, establishing version control protocols that ensured traceability of code changes and facilitated collaborative development among distributed teams.

Applied critical thinking to solve complex healthcare data challenges, developing algorithms that cleaned and normalized inconsistent medical records from various sources to improve AI model accuracy.

Implemented real-time healthcare monitoring systems using Java and Python, building alert mechanisms that notified medical staff of critical patient condition changes based on continuous data analysis.
Developed AI-powered drug interaction checkers using LLMs, creating systems that analyzed prescription combinations and flagged potential conflicts to prevent adverse reactions in patient treatments.

Built secure healthcare authentication systems using Java, implementing multi-factor authentication and role-based access controls that ensured only authorized personnel could access sensitive patient information.

Applied machine learning techniques to predict disease outbreaks, analyzing historical healthcare data with Python models that identified patterns and potential public health risks before they became widespread.

Created AI-powered clinical trial matching systems, developing algorithms that connected eligible patients with appropriate research studies based on their medical history and current health conditions.

Integrated banking domain knowledge with healthcare payment systems, designing secure transaction processing solutions that handled insurance claims and patient billing while maintaining PCI compliance.

Developed AI-powered medical coding systems, creating natural language processing models that automatically assigned correct billing codes to clinical documentation, reducing manual errors and processing time.
Applied automotive industry experience to healthcare logistics, optimizing medical supply chain management systems that tracked equipment and medication distribution to hospitals and clinics.

Utilized consulting methodologies to implement AI solutions in healthcare settings, guiding organizations through digital transformation while addressing regulatory requirements and stakeholder concerns.
